name: Between Edges
description:
Hey,

This is the new VimJam 2 game entry named "Between Edges".

It features no multiplayer, not really a story, or other things AAA-titles have, but  it has fun gameplay(IMO).

Here is a look at the story and main features this game offers:

You play a minion of a boss and try to escape a canyon, you unfortunately fell in. To get to your boss, who is standing on the outside of the canyon,  you jump between the walls, dodge obstacles like falling rocks and the exclusive feature:

Place bricks as the boss to help some of the obstacles!!!

If you like what you just heard, please download this game and try it out! (And tell me your opinion to my game :) )

Have fun

Pikarobi
